name: Going for a Walk - cryptOpening
description: This is a digital work made in collaboration between 3D artist Pierre Plouzeau and visual artist Benjamin Spark. Each collector will have access to the MP4 file in high resolution. In this work, the iconic "DandyWalker" from Pierre Plouzeau appears surrounded by paintings from Benjamin Spark. The action is situated in a virtual art fair. It is the opening and everyone is drinking champagne and having a good time:-)
